name: callPerson
description: Initiate a call to a specified person

name: sendMessage
description: send message to a recipient with a specific content
parameters: {'recipient': 'recipient of the message', 'message': 'content of the message'}

name: createContact
description: Create a new contact with a name and phone number.
parameters: {'name': 'Name of the contact to be created', 'phone_number': 'Phone number of the contact'}

name: createTimerWithSettings
description: Create a timer with specified hours, minutes, and seconds without starting it.
parameters: {'hours': 'Number of hours for the timer', 'minutes': 'Number of minutes for the timer', 'seconds': 'Number of seconds for the timer', 'start_automatically': 'Boolean indicating whether the timer should start automatically'}

name: fillContactFormWithoutSaving
description: Fill in a new contact form with provided details without saving the contact.
parameters: {'first_name': 'First name of the contact', 'last_name': 'Last name of the contact', 'phone': 'Phone number of the contact', 'phone_label': 'Label for the phone number (e.g., Mobile, Home)'}

name: findHotelsByLocationAndDates
description: Find hotels in a specific location for a specified date range.
parameters: {'location': 'The location to search for hotels', 'check_in_date': 'The check-in date for the hotel stay', 'check_out_date': 'The check-out date for the hotel stay'}

name: resendLastMessageToRecipient
description: Resend the last message sent to a specified recipient.
parameters: {'recipient': 'Name of the recipient to whom the message was sent'}

name: searchForURL
description: Search for or open a specific URL in a web browser.
parameters: {'url': 'The URL to search for or open'}

name: findAndCallContact
description: Find a contact by name and initiate a call to them.
parameters: {'contact_name': 'Name of the contact to find and call'}

name: createContactAndCall
description: Create a new contact with a name and phone number, and then initiate a call to the contact.
parameters: {'name': 'Name of the contact to be created', 'phone_number': 'Phone number of the contact', 'call_recipient': 'Name of the person to call'}

name: manageContactsAndCall
description: Create a new contact, delete an existing contact, set a contact to favorites, and call a contact.
parameters: {'new_contact_name': 'Name of the new contact to be created', 'new_contact_number': 'Phone number of the new contact', 'contact_to_delete': 'Name of the contact to be deleted', 'contact_to_favorite': 'Name of the contact to be set to favorites', 'call_recipient': 'Name of the contact to call'}
